text: The women's 200 metres event at the 1991 Summer Universiade was held at the Don Valley Stadium in Sheffield on 23 and 24 July 1991. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Wang Huei-Chen '''' |Sølvi Olsen '''' |Michelle Collins '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Heats results Wind: Heat 1: ? m/s, Heat 2: +2.3 m/s, Heat 3: ? m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;font-size:95%" |- !
